about_the_game:
The nostalgic music of Ghosts 'n Goblins is back from the grave!

The Ghosts 'n Goblins Resurrection Original Soundtrack boasts newly arranged versions of tracks familiar to champions of the original Ghosts 'n Goblins and Ghouls 'n Ghosts as well as a number of new whimsical and spooky tracks that are sure to rattle your armor.

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
